validation.name_max: Preset name must be less than 80 characters!
validation.description_max: Comment must be less than 255 characters!

message.distinct_warning: You have to make sure all the selected columns in the "Sort On" tab to appear in the "Columns" tab when turning on this option, otherwise, you won't be able to export the list
message.choose_at_least_column_save_as: The save as was not successful! Please choose at least one column to be displayed.
message.update_system_preset_warning: Making changes to this preset will affect the default displayed result on the list for all other users. Are you sure you want to proceed?
message.confirm_delete_preset: Are you sure you want to delete the selected preset?
message.bypassing_cache: Do you want to bypass the cache? The exporting progress might be longer if you bypass the cache.

label.choose_column_displayed: Choose the columns to be displayed

tooltip.close: Close the Make A List window
